data.title: CONTENTdm
data.meta_description: Letter written to Andrew Charles Moore by his friend John McLaren McBryde wishing his success in his endeavors. McBryde agreed to write a letter of recomendation for A. C. Moore. McBryde was the President of the University of South Carolina at the time he wrote this letter.
data.text:
